Detailed Description

Class which describes the waveform data of an audio track.

The gain values represent the average gain for an audio frame. For audio codecs which do not operate on a per frame bases (eg. ALAW, ULAW) a reasonable audio frame duration will be assumed (eg. 50ms). {}

base::Vector<int16_t> gaia::media::WaveformData::getFrameGains ( )
Returns:
The array of frame gains. The size of the array is the frames count. The values of the frame gains range from 0 to 255.

The number of frames within the waveform data
